description.narrative: By 2017, the capacity to plan and manage social welfare workforce, finance and age-/gender-appropriate services of child protection systems to prevent and respond to violence, abuse, exploitation and neglect strengthened at Federal, State and LGA level, which contributes to Child Protection Systems, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: A child protection system that responds to and protect children from violence, abuse and exploitation is operational and harmonized across all States by 2017

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2017, the capacity to plan and manage social welfare workforce, finance and age-/gender-appropriate services of child protectionsystems to prevent and respond to violence, abuse, exploitation and neglect strengthened at Federal, State and LGA level

description.narrative: The Social Workforce Professionalization Bill was enacted. Analysis of current levels of public expenditure resulted in increase in 2018 public budget for child protection in Cross River. Improved coordination and data management resulted in 25per cent increase of children reporting as victims of VAC in Cross River receiving services. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:19/01/2018

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) Child protection system has either preventive or response services available

actual.value: 2015:Technical Assistance has been provided to the Federal Ministry of Women Affairs and Social Development for the finalisation of the draft Social Welfare Policy to be completed in the first half of 2016

2015:The Social Welfare Workforce Strengthening Steering Committee was supported to re-strategize on advocating/lobbying for the passage of a Bill on Professionalization of Social Work. The Social Welfare Workforce Strengthening Steering Committee was also supported to re-package, re-strategize and repre

title.narrative: Social Welfare Services Costing Framework adopted

actual.value: 2015:The social welfare services costing framework was developed and adopted by the Social Welfare department of the Federal Ministry of Women Affairs.
